metadata.title: USN-6614-1 -- amanda vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that amanda did not properly check certain arguments. A local unprivileged attacker could possibly use this issue to perform a  privilege escalation attack.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6614-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  amanda-client - 1:3.5.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 amanda-common - 1:3.5.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 amanda-server - 1:3.5.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
